text: munaafiqhiinit Yallih Nabii adá aba maray usuk aytiy isik axcinnaanihim ankacsaah nummaysa kaak iyya mari keenit yan, Nabiyow keenik ixxic; usuk siinih kayri aytî kal umaaneh aytiy umaané ankacissa hinna, usuk Yalla nummaysaah moominiin kaah bahta xaagul ken naummaysah, usuk siinik yeemene marah nacror kinni, Yallih farmoyta adá abah yan mari qansarissi ken hayta digaalá lon
